channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Throws SPAM Away
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Throws SPAM Away

item.title: CVE-2022-1709|2024-08-03T00:10:03.915Z -- unknown -- throws%20spam%20away
item.description: The Throws SPAM Away WordPress plugin before 3.3.1 does not have CSRF checks in place when deleting comments (either all, spam, or pending), allowing attackers to make a logged in admin delete comments via a CSRF attack
